original_text: They were looking intently up into the sky as he was going, when suddenly two men dressed in white stood beside them.
korean_text: 올라가실 때에 제자들이 자세히 하늘을 쳐다보고 있는데 흰 옷 입은 두 사람이 그들 곁에 서서

sentences.original_text: They were looking intently up into the sky
when suddenly two men dressed in white
sentences.korean_translation: 갑자기 흰 옷을 입은 두 사람이
